body:

All being said...I enjoyed it XD

I mean I do love NTR but this story was just trash... :/
The woman was too easy to fall. She literally showed no concern when her son found out. Bull shit.

When he's done with her he'll use her to make money until she's useless.

She's gonna be fucked in a whole different way when she gets old and her tits sag
Busted already like 10 nuts to this in the past month. This is some top tier Mother Abandonment NTR. Absolutely love the corruption at page 27 where she even insults her family. Hot as fuck.
i wish the son or dad would have done something

This may sound disturbing. But i really hoped that the son would come up while those two would be at it and blow up their faces with a 12.gauge shotgun.
too soft, in the end chizuru should have gotten pregnant
MORE! MORE! MORE!
this makes me rage so hard. should have kicked some ass instead of being a coward. but i guess, well done author, the emotions and the weird boner came across just fine.
Kill all cucks.

okay so i take back my word this doujin was fucking garbage

We jyst jumped from "shes a probation officer" to "shes some random kids cumslut" like cmon, the part where the kid blackmails or rapes the chick to tie it all together is usually the best part of the doujin, fucking garbage crap 1/10

So the son knows what's going on sees that she gets defensive for the kid and yet does nothing like " hey dad she's been cheating on you with this kid for a while now and if you want to divorce her you're welcome to" this author has some kind of vendetta towards women or something cause every single one of them in his stories are the worse type of human garbage alive.
Kill all cucks, nice art style though
